details.description: A face-to-face feedback session is run with the group/individual, where the work is discussed. A selected student (the scribe) keeps notes of the feedback and discussion. The scribe then writes up these notes into a formal document, which the tutor signs off at a later date.
details.applicability: Particularly helpful for complex assignments with no one answer and debatable results (requiring much discussion during feedback)
details.consequences: Can result in extra workload for students (in particulary the scribe). Opens up the potential of argument with the student group.
